body:
Hey Guys!

I am a long-time user of MCZone / Avicus and I decided to bring some of my daily flare to the forums!

What's Happening: Well, I am going to be hosting a general chat panel on the discussion you are reading right now! Feel free to add your input on any conversation! Jammin' With Jamesy is my way of strengthening my bond with the Avicus community!

Yo, the discussion is dead and I don't know what to write about!:
If the discussion is quiet, you should strike up a conversation! Act like you are text-messaging someone and the conversation will flow! Please remember o keep it respectful and PG-13. My laptop is on 24/7 so it won't be hard for me to chat with you guys as-well! Thank you for your time and I can't wait to talk to you on Jammin' With Jamesy!

title: Jammin' With Jamesy!
